articles.author: BILL BARROW, CHARLOTTE KRAMON
articles.title: Jimmy Carter and hometown of Plains celebrate the 39th president’s 100th birthday - The Associated Press
articles.description: Former president Jimmy Carter celebrates his 100th birthday Tuesday. It is the first time an American president has lived a full century and marks a milestone in a life that took the son of a Depression-era farmer to the White House and across the world as an…
articles.content: ATLANTA (AP) Jimmy Carter is preparing to celebrate his 100th birthday on Tuesday, the first time an American president has lived a full century and the latest milestone in a life that took the son o… [+4449 chars]

articles.author: Allegra Goodwin, Gianluca Mezzofiore
articles.title: US-made 2,000-pound bombs likely used in strike that killed Hezbollah chief Nasrallah, CNN analysis shows - CNN
articles.description: American-manufactured 2,000-pound bombs were likely used in the Israeli attack that killed Hezbollah’s leader, Hassan Nasrallah, in Beirut on Friday night, according to a review of footage showing the operation and its aftermath by CNN and munitions experts.
